LECTURE_AUTO_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type 'oui' to active or 'non' to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

TELECHARGER_AUTO_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically(type 'oui' to active or 'non' to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type 'oui' to active or 'non' to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

LIENS_MENU.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

MODE_PUBLIC.description: type 'oui' to put your bot on public mode or 'non' to put it on private mod

HEROKU_APY_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is optionnal)

APILOLHUMAIN.description: put your api key of website api.lolhuman.xyz(this is optionnal ,if you don't have)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes
